text: I saw <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Can-I-query-a-non-HubSpot-API-to-pull-data-into-a-HubSpot-email/m-p/925842#M71209|your post in the community> let me know if what I suggested is helpful

<@U05NR1PG32T>, you can remove the padding entirely by adding `hs_enable_module_padding=False` to the opening dnd_module tag.

I am also running into issues publishing templates with custom modules. There's a community post about this that I tagged the Associate Product Manager there to hopefully get some insight from.

Thanks!

I passed this along to my HubSpot admin and he had this to say. Context, we don’t have Operations Hub and your post mentioned _“If you do not have Operation Hub Pro, you could still use this API through another platform that your developers could configure.”_

> I’ve seen the Beta documentation. From his explanation, I don’t understand how we’re able to do this without Operations Hub since that’s the only way to use a Custom code action in a workflow.

Brilliant, thanks so much <@U042JNC6ZAM>! Good to know.

I'll also keep my eye on that module issue. Cheers.

You would need to use a platform outside of HubSpot, like Zapier, to make the api call. If that's not an option, then <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/marketing-email/set-up-an-rss-to-email-blog-subscription-for-an-external-blog|an RSS feed> would be your best option.
